content.rendered:
Welcome to our Year 6 Class Page!

Welcome to year 6… your last year here at Springvale Primary!

Meet the amazing team…Mrs Mayston, Mrs Wildsmith, Mrs Kent, Miss Heeley and Mrs Haigh!

We are kind, crazy and fun….especially when you do fantastic work and are super kind to each other!

It’s a year for excelling in all subjects but the most fun of all is the amazing residential trip to Robinwood…which fingers crossed will be going ahead in March 2021!

We also thrive on exciting topics And books: Egypt, Maya (chocolate), Nevermoor, Harry Potter, Clockwork and Skellig just to name a few.

#playtogetherlearntogetherachievetogether

Our PPA Cover is provided by Mrs Fearn

jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Welcome to our Year 5 Class Page! jetpack-related-posts.title: Springvale FC
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Welcome to our Springvale FC page.  Here we will give you our latest news on results, fixtures and star players! We are passionate about coaching football for all ages, all abilities and both boys and girls. We have lots of teams to cover all ages and abilities as we believe…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Year 2
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Welcome to Class 2 – The Sensational Seacoles! Our class teacher is Mrs Royston and Mrs Andrew on Fridays.
